title: China looks to nuclear option to ease winter heating woes
desc: In effort to reduce dependency on coal, China is investing in nuclear reactors to ease its energy needs.

title: Using both Python 2 and 3 in Windows
desc: The release of Django 2.0 was a milestone in the history of Python since it completely dropped support for Python 2.x. I am a long time user of Django and, loyal to the philosophy of “if it is working don’t change” I was always using Python 2.x.

title: Apple Plans Combined iPhone, iPad & Mac Apps to Create One User Experience
desc: Apple Inc.’s iPhone and iPad introduced a novel way of interacting with computers: via easy-to-use applications, accessible in the highly curated App Store.

title: Bitcoin Cash deals frozen as insider trading is probed
desc: One of the US's leading crypto-currency exchanges is carrying out an insider trading investigation.
